commit message: * Added changes.txt. Should have done a nicer job of this from the begining.

* Fixed layouts that did not prorperly use tkj.android.homecontrol.ui.AutoRepeatButton
* Reformatted layouts

strings.xml
* Added strings and values for key repeat interval preference.

MythMotePreferences.java
* Added key repeat preference.

AutoRepeatButton.java
* Added key repeat interval setting which affects all AutoRepeatButtons. Attribute defined interval will override system setting.

MythMote.java
* Implemented setting AutoRepeatButton's interval from shared preferences.

string.xml
* updated key repeat interval description.
